title: Captain Beefheart - The Spotlight Kid-Clear Spot (1972) [APE]
description:
Captain Beefheart and The Magic Band - The Spotlight Kid-Clear Spot (1972/2006)

Genre: US, Blues rock, Psychedelic rock, Protopunk
